# qtwirl

qtwirl (quick-twirl), one-function interface to [AlphaTwirl](https://github.com/alphatwirl/alphatwirl)

***

### Quick start

- Jupyter Notebook: [*Quick start of AlphaTwirl*](https://github.com/alphatwirl/notebook-tutorial-2019-02)<br />
